original_text: And Israel stretched out his right hand and laid it on the head of Ephraim, who was the younger, and his left hand on the head of Manasseh, crossing his hands (for Manasseh was the firstborn).
korean_text: 이스라엘이 오른손을 펴서 차남 에브라임의 머리에 얹고 왼손을 펴서 므낫세의 머리에 얹으니 므낫세는 장자라도 팔을 엇바꾸어 얹었더라

sentences.original_text: And Israel stretched out his right hand
and laid it on the head of Ephraim
and his left hand on the head of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 왼손을 므낫세의 머리에 얹었습니다.
